channel.title: Old School Football Coach
channel.description: Recent content on Old School Football Coach

item.title: Build 21-12 Available - Timeouts, Touchbacks, & More
item.description: A new update (21-12) of Old School Football Coach is here! The new changes include the following: New Features: Timeouts have been implemented! It’s now possible to call a timeout during the game. Calling a timeout allows you to stop the game clock, reset the play clock, and select a new play before the ball is snapped. Timeouts can be called from the game menu. Computer controlled players are now smart enough to take a touchback when appropriate after receiving a kick, interception, or fumble.

item.title: Build 21-10 Available - Option Plays, Playbooks, & More
item.description: A new update (21-10) of Old School Football Coach is here! The new changes include the following: New Features: Teams now have head coaches associated with them that modify different aspects of the team. Coaches now have their own playbook, meaning teams no longer have the same plays available to them. You can likewise set up your own playbook in career mode. Coaches can set a desired offensive philosophy, such as “power run”, “quick pass”, and more.

item.title: Build 2108 Available - Create a Player & More
item.description: A new update (21-08) of Old School Football Coach is here! The new updates include the following: New Features: It is now possible to create and edit players. This can be accessed by editing a team through the league management menu and clicking a button to edit the team’s roster. From there you can select new options to add/edit/delete players. It is now possible to set a team’s desired text font, similar to setting team colors.

item.title: Build 21-07 Available - Player Injuries
item.description: A new update (21-07) of Old School Football Coach is now publicly available! In addition to various bug fixes it includes a new major features! Player Injuries Football players can now get injured during games. The chances of injury increase as the player’s fatigue worsens. An injury to a player in career mode might mean several weeks of healing, resulting in players missing games. Be sure to bench your best players when you find yourself in the middle of a blow-out to prevent costly injuries!

item.title: Build 21-06 Available
item.description: Happy Memorial Day! A new development build (21-06) of Old School Football Coach is now publicly available, which, in addition to various bug fixes, includes 2 major features! Player Fatigue The football players on your team have always had a stamina attribute, but until now it didn’t have a major impact on their performance. That all changes with this update. Players will now get fatigued as they play, and as their condition worsens so will their other abilities.

item.title: Build 21-05 Available
item.description: Development build (21-05) of Old School Football Coach is now publicly available! Notable changes include: New Features / Improvements In career mode, recruits can now have a new interest: “Recent Success”. In other words, if recent success is important to a recruit, you can influence them more towards your team if you’ve been doing well lately. This interest is also different from the other ones because the recruit’s feelings can change on it week-to-week depending on how your team is doing.

item.title: Build 2021-04 Available
item.description: A new early access development build (2021-04) of Old School Football Coach is now publicly available! Notable changes include: Postseason Games There is now support for postseason games and they are highly customizable! You can configure the number of playoff spots available in your league and decide of if only the top-ranked teams make it in, or if conference champions have an automatic bid. You can also decide if you want to create your own bowl games and how teams get selected for them as well.

item.title: Old School Football Coach Dev Build 2021-02 Now Available
item.description: Another new development build of Old School Football Coach is publicly available! Notable changes include: New Features Conference championship games have been implemented in career mode. At the end of the regular season the top two teams in each conference will be matched up for a conference championship game. It is now possible to edit conferences in the League Management menu in addition to creating and deleting them. Penalties can now be declined.

item.title: Old School Football Coach Dev Build 2021-01 Now Available
item.description: A new development build of Old School Football Coach is now publicly available! This update largely focuses on new features and improvements, listed below. Remappable Keybindings It’s now possible to configure in-game controls from the Settings menu. Right now this only supports keyboard keys, but controller support is a planned feature for the future. Control the Snap While on offense and using the standard control method, it is now possible to control when the ball gets snapped.

item.title: Early Access Available on itch.io
item.description: Old School Football Coach is now available for early access on itch.io! The game is very playable in it’s current state, but I’ll be continuing development and delivering additional features and improvements in the future. Those who purchase the early access will be supporting development and will receive updates at no additional charge!

item.title: Website Launch
item.description: This is the new website for Old School Football Coach! Old School Football Coach is an in-development American college football PC game in the sports management simulation genre. You can call your team’s plays and do your best to lead them to victory. For a more in-depth experience, the game also offers a career mode where you can recruit new players, set up depth charts, and other activities you would expect from a college football coach.
